   - Watch for coded words: *‚Äúopen-minded,‚Äù ‚Äúfreelance,‚Äù ‚Äúgenerous men,‚Äù ‚Äúindependent‚Äù*.  

3. **Verification**

   - Instead, look for Instagram linked (and check if it‚Äôs lifestyle-oriented vs. promo-style).

1. **Ask about daytime life**  
   - Example: *‚ÄúWhat do you usually do on Sundays?‚Äù*  
   - Genuine matches mention friends, hobbies, errands.

2. **Talk about simple activities**

3. **Check work context**

---

## ‚ö° **Meeting Filters**

‚úÖ **Safe Strategy for You**

from datetime import datetime, timezone

# We don't have access to historical "received_at" timestamps for each prior message.

messages = [
    {"content": "Today can be rooftops part 2"},
    {"content": "Yeah we'll continue from yesterday. I wasn't able to go to a bunch at night yesterday, so tonight will go to a few more"},
    {"content": "[image] Elevator mirror selfie ‚Äî for episode cover inspiration"},
    {"content": "Generate"},
    {"content": "Does the to be continued make sense? That would make more sense on the previous episode"},

    {"content": "[images] Skyline in rain + Sugar Club sign + Soi 11 street view"},
    {"content": "For whatever reason, the threat for episode 8 is all messed up, so I'm going to dictate some notes here that are technically related to the previous episode. Quick recap last night on the way back home I was walking on soil 11 and then I looked to the left. I'm like okay. Why does this place have a line? Everything else is empty and the place was sugar. I've heard about it before that. It's like an afrobeats hip hop place so I wanted to go check it out and I went. And ended up having a pretty interesting night. First literally as soon as I walk in this girl grabs me and starts dancing on me I'm like hey I'm not going to reject that so that was nice and we ended up hanging out a bunch by the bar.  she was with like four other friends. That we're having hookah at the bar and just hanging out so I ended up dancing with her pretty much for like a few hours. Mind you this is already like 3:00 a.m.  and anyways I invited her back to the house. She said okay but I only if my friend joins too. Which I didn't mind so we went to get some beers. Mind you one clue in the bar was that she asked me to pay for her drink which I thought is this girl working for sugar and just trying to get people to buy drinks. Anyways fast forward we go back to the crib we're sitting on the couch or actually before even we got upstairs they started talking about money and getting paid and how much am I going to pay them? So that was no bueno but we came up to the apartment hung out for a bit on the balcony and then hung out on the couch and they were trying to tease me and get me to pay them but I remain strong. I didn't want to just pay for sex so they were pretty upset and ended up leaving. When we were sitting on the couch door giving me a lecture about how in Bangkok you have to pay for sex and that's the only way. Anyway, so that ended up being a crazy end to yesterday. Probably went to bed at like 6:00 so caught up today on sleep a little bit. But I'm definitely feeling tired and I'm about to go get a massage from the same guy from episode 8 cuz he did incredible and from there I'm going to go to a few more rooftops but right now it's looking super gloomy outside. It just started raining really badly so we'll see. It might not be the best night for rooftops."},
    {"content": "[image] Google Maps Sugar Club screenshot"},
    {"content": "Yeah I was initially. I was pretty excited that it's a genuine interaction so it ended up being kind of disappointing that it wasn't. But yeah, that just proves that this neighborhood that I am at  is just full of sex workers so I got to go out in other parts of town."},
    {"content": "Generate"},
    {"content": "[images] Two skyline photos at dusk"},
    {"content": "At home I'm about to get ready and go get a massage and then have my meeting over the phone. Then maybe I'll check out some spots in the area around the massage parlor. I already know there's some rooftops there and some cool bars."},
    {"content": "[image] Tinder chat screenshot"},
    {"content": "Got a match on tinder, might be another worker. What does freelance mean?"},
    {"content": "Yes"},
    {"content": "Yes, make sure to address no ladyboys"},
    {"content": "Yes"},
    {"content": "So last night after my meeting I was supposed to take a nap and then go out. Guess what? That nap ended up. Just continuing snooze and snoozed and snoozed and now it's 5:21 a.m.  might as well sleep a few more hours and then go enjoy exploration of the city"},
    {"content": "Generate"},
    {"content": "Recap this episode"},
    {"content": "[image] CCare Massage Sukhumvit 11 map screenshot"},
    {"content": "Okay few updates. I was running late and there was a lot of traffic and heavy rain so I didn't go to the massage that's further away instead. I went to a massage right by the house that I've gone to a bunch of times and it's really good. Then from the massage I came back home had my meeting from the apartment. And then even got dressed to go out but ended up taking a nap and then the nap extended and I just slept through the night. Can you generate a card for the massage place please?"},
    {"content": "Generate"},
    {"content": "[images] Rooftop gym + pool + skyline set"},
    {"content": "Finished a workout. Feeling nice and pumped to go explore that new neighborhood I heard about a few episodes ago"},
    {"content": "I am thinking Rooftop episodes can feature real photos for more context. Also I have been taking panoramic photos so we can include those in the final blog to make the experience more immersive"},
    {"content": "Yes generate"},
    {"content": "Technically today is episode 10 right?"},
    {"content": "Start a new conversation in the project for episode 10"},
    {"content": "There is a bunch of episode 10 information that I shared here. Can you generate a file with all the information the actual dialogue that we had so I can paste it in the other conversation for episode 10"},
    {"content": "No, that doesn't contain everything. I mean every single message that I've sent with today's timestamp based the timestamp on the moment that you receive the message"},
]

# Build Markdown transcript with placeholder timestamps
md_lines = [
    f"# Episode 10 ‚Äì Today's User Messages",
    f"_Date (UTC)_: {today_str}",
    "",
    "> Note: Exact per-message reception timestamps are not available in this chat export. ",
    "> Each entry is marked with `timestamp_unavailable`. Order is preserved.",
    "",
    "---",
]

for i, m in enumerate(messages, 1):
    md_lines.append(f"**{i:02d}. [timestamp_unavailable]** {m['content']}")

md_content = "\n\n".join(md_lines)

# Also provide a JSONL for structured pasting
jsonl_lines = []
for m in messages:
    jsonl_lines.append(
        '{"received_at":"", "received_at_note":"timestamp_unavailable", "content": '
        + f"{repr(m['content'])}" + "}"
    )
jsonl_content = "\n".join(jsonl_lines)

md_path = Path("/mnt/data/episode10_user_messages_today.md")
jsonl_path = Path("/mnt/data/episode10_user_messages_today.jsonl")
md_path.write_text(md_content)
jsonl_path.write_text(jsonl_content)

[str(md_path), str(jsonl_path)]
